name: Monk's Focus
effects: you gain Focus Points equal to your Monk level (see class table)
you regain all expended Focus Points when you finish a short or long rest
Focus Point save DC equals 8 + your Wisdom modifier + proficiency bonus
notes: See Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind for baseline Focus Point options.
